content: To obtain the Cosmo Radiance, you need to defeat Yellowbrow in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West. This is the final boss of the chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cosmo_Radiance.md', within the main section titled 'Cosmo Radiance'.
The content is as follows:
To obtain the Cosmo Radiance, you need to defeat Yellowbrow in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West. This is the final boss of the chapter.
